# EntityHealSource Class

> [!CAUTION]
> This class is still in pre-release.  Its signature may change or it may be removed in future releases.

Provides information about how healing has been applied to an entity.

## Properties

### **cause**
`read-only cause: EntityHealCause;`

Cause enumerator of the source of healing.

Type: [*EntityHealCause*](EntityHealCause.md)
